00001 namespace Drive_LFSS.Log_
00002 {
00003     using System;
00004     using System.Collections.Generic;
00005     using Drive_LFSS.Server_;

00007     public enum LogType
00008     {
00009         LOG_FULL = 0,
00010         LOG_NORMAL = 1,
00011         LOG_CHAT = 2,
00012         LOG_COMMAND = 4,
00013         LOG_ERROR = 8,
00014         LOG_DEBUG = 16,
00015         LOG_NETWORK = 32,
00016         LOG_PING = 64
00017     }
00018     //If Color Not Allways Working Good, Cause log is Used by MultiThread! and Console Color Seem to be... MS way :)
00019     sealed public class sLog
00020     {
00021         public sLog(ushort _serverId)
00022         {
00023             if (!isInitialized)
00024             {
00025                 throw new Exception("You can't Create Log Without Initializing, Please call: sLog.Init() First!");
00026             }
00027             serverId = _serverId;
00028         }
00029         public sLog()
00030         {
00031             if (!isInitialized)
00032             {
00033                 throw new Exception("You can't Create Log Without Initializing, Please call: sLog.Init() First!");
00034             }
00035             serverId = 0;
00036         }
00037         public LogType logDisable = LogType.LOG_FULL;
00038         public ushort serverId = 0;
00039 
00040         private const string LOG_FILE_PATH = @".\drive_lfss.log";
00041         private static System.IO.StreamWriter streamWriter;
00042         private static bool isInitialized = false;
00043 
00044         public static bool Init()
00045         {
00046             isInitialized = true;
00047             try
00048             {
00049                 streamWriter = System.IO.File.CreateText(LOG_FILE_PATH);
00050             }
00051             catch (System.Exception error)
00052             {
00053                 Console.Write(System.DateTime.Now + " - ERROR---: " + error.Message + "\r\n");
00054                 Console.Write("Please Check Error Comming from the Log System.\r\nDrive Life For Speed Server, can't continue without log system.\r\n");
00055                 return false;
00056             }
00057             return true;
00058         }
00059         public static void flush()
00060         {
00061             streamWriter.Flush();
00062         }
00063         public void error(string msg)
00064         {
00065             if ((logDisable & LogType.LOG_ERROR) > 0)return;
00066             string _serverName = GetServerName();
00067 
00068             lock (this)
00069             {
00070                 streamWriter.Write(System.DateTime.Now + _serverName + " ERROR--: " + msg);
00071                 Console.ForegroundColor = ConsoleColor.Red;
00072                 Console.Write(_serverName + msg);
00073                 Console.ForegroundColor = ConsoleColor.Gray;
00074             }
00075         }
00076         public void normal(string msg)
00077         {
00078             if ((logDisable & LogType.LOG_ERROR) > 0) return;
00079             string _serverName = GetServerName();
00080 
00081             lock (this)
00082             {
00083                 streamWriter.Write(System.DateTime.Now + _serverName + " NORMAL-: " + msg);
00084                 Console.ForegroundColor = ConsoleColor.DarkGreen;
00085                 Console.Write(_serverName + msg);
00086                 Console.ForegroundColor = ConsoleColor.Gray;
00087             }
00088         }

00090         {

00154 
00155         private string GetServerName()
00156         {
00157             if (serverId == 0)
00158                 return "";
00159 
00160             //Create Function into Server Go that That Info
00161             if (Session.serverList.ContainsKey(serverId))
00162                 return "Server["+serverId+/*Session.server[serverId].settings.connectionName+*/"] -> ";
00163 
00164             return "Unknow -> ";
00165         }
00166     }
